conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir, could you please tell us what's causing the delay of the train?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We've been waiting for quite a while now.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience. There seems to be a signal failure up ahead.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Oh no, that's frustrating! Is there an estimate for when the issue will be resolved?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We can't afford to be late for our appointment.
